title: Did not receive my Premium chest with the Garen and Ashe shards in them
body: As the title says I did not receive the chest with the Garen and Ashe shards.

replies.body: At level 16 now, I appreciate how patient you've been waiting for that chest.  I've added it to your account now!  Sorry for the wait!
Hey thanks for giving me the premium chest man! I got a Hecarim skin shards out of it.
